title: Ysela Ochoa Tapia
text:
Soy Educadora y Profesora en las areas de Matemática y Estadística.



M.Sc. Mathematics and Statistics, 2014,  Universidad of Puerto Rico Recinto de Mayaguez, USA.
B.Sc. Education Mathematics, 2011,  Universidad of Puerto Rico Recinto de Mayaguez, USA.
B.Sc. Mathematics, 2003,  Universidad San Antonio Abad del Cusco, Perú.





Mar 2023 - Present, Full Time Professor

Science Department. Continental University, Cusco-Perú

Teaching Undergraduate Courses: MATE 1.0, MATE 2.0


Ago 2014 - Jul 2017, Full Time Assistant Professor.

Mathematical Scinece Dpt. University of Puerto Rico at Mayaguez.

Teaching Undergraduate Courses: Calculus, Pre-Calculus, Razonamiento Matemático.






Educación, Pedagogía, Matemáticas, Estadísticas.

title: Ysela Ochoa Tapia
text:
MATHEMATICS & STATISTICS

I’m fulltime professor at the “Universidad Contintental”, focusing on Mathematics, and Statistics courses.
I’m applying my professional knowledge in academia.
I enjoy making research, prepare didactical clases, and use tools for efficiently teaching.
I studied Mathematics and Statistics, finishing my Master in Science in 2014, I worked in academia (teaching and doing research). I usually use Latex, R and my Ipad to develop my clases.
I love teaching and motherhood!
